=== Installation ===

~- Proceed to step two if you arrived at this page from the Software Center. -~

==== Step 1 ====

<nowiki>[[File:SoftwareCenterMenu.png]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[File:SoftwareCenter.png]]</nowiki>

Load '''Software Center''' from the Application Menu.

<nowiki>[[File:SoftwareCenter-1.png]]</nowiki>

Type in "'''community-themes'''" in the search input box located in the upper right hand corner of the form. Either click the search icon or press enter.

<nowiki>[[File:SoftwareCenter-2.png]]</nowiki>

Click the '''Install-Free''' button to install the package.

==== Step 2 ====

<nowiki>[[File:Desktop.png]]</nowiki>

Once the package is loaded select the Appearance Preferences dialog as show above.

<nowiki>[[File:AppearancePreferences.png]]</nowiki>

Select the desired theme with a single click and then click the close button.

=== Errata ===

Changes made late in the development cycle to the Murrine theme engine may cause error or warning messages to appear in the terminal window. These messages are informative and do not affect the operation of the theme.
